title: Royal Park Apartments
details:
PRICE SLASHED FOR QUICK SALE-A BARGAIN. Spectacular Offer-2 Units On 22nd Floor Can Be Joined To Give You A 2700sqft Of Space. Client Looking For Selling Each Unit At 34 Million. Please Note That These 2 Apartments Are The Only Apartments In The Building Which Could Be Joined.
More-our Company Can Undertake The Renovation To Make It Into Brand New Shape.
The Property Is A Large Property Consisting Of 2 Towers With A Very Large Swimming Pool, Gym, 2 Squash Courts, Billiard Room, Party Room, Restaurant, Cargills Mini Mart, Tennis Court, Jogging Track, Ample Parking For Visitors. PRESENTLY RENTED AT RS 160,000 PER MONTH
